name: iPad Pencil of Destruction
imagePrompt: A sleek, digitally enhanced blade or stylus, with subtle gothic and punk accents. It glows with a network of digital patterns, looking sharp and impactful. There's a hint of a 'bag of a killer' aesthetic.
abilityText: Your attacks deal 2 extra damage. 'Just go away.'
flavorText: It's not my fault if you're weak. And I don't mean physically.

weaponEffect.description: After your hero attacks, deal 2 extra damage to the target.
